subject: Re: [junit] Running parallel tests in JUnit4.4+
msgSnippet: Hi again, ... Sorting and filtering in general could possibly be solved in this manner as well, with reservation for managing the Description. Cheers Daniel
messageBody:
Hi again,


On Fri, 2008-08-01 at 01:43 +0200, Daniel Brolund wrote:
> Hi David,
>

> The next step might be that Statements (or some derivative thereof)
> are:
> * hierachial
> * traversable
> * dependable
>
> Then you can choose different traversers to either:
> 1. traverse the statement hierarchy and evaluate (current behavior)
> 2. ï»¿traverse the statement hierarchy, resolve dependenices and execute
> in dependency order
> 3. 2) + ignore dependent tests
> 4. 1), 2) or 3) + parallelize execution
>

Sorting and filtering in general could possibly be solved in this manner
as well, with reservation for managing the Description.

Cheers
Daniel
